name: Sexy Shuriken Struggle
description:
Back in the arcades, I tossed a lot of coins into games like Gals Panic, and Pip & Bibi's just to see some digital nakedness. I wish more arcade devs had gone into adult games back then. I would have loooooved to see a stripping game with ninjas and shurikens.... and I still do!

TDMBP felt the same, which is how this project got started. We hope you enjoy it, as we'd like to continue the project based on the feedback! :)
